tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ConflictOfInterest (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reviewer_id INT,
    conflict_details TEXT,
    review_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE researchers (
  researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  institution_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE research_papers (
  paper_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  paper_title VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
  researcher_id INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES researchers(researcher_id)
)

CREATE TABLE conflicts_of_interest (
  conflict_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  paper_id INT NOT NULL,
  researcher_id INT NOT NULL,
  conflict_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (paper_id) REFERENCES research_papers(paper_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES researchers(researcher_id)
)

CREATE TABLE peer_review_assignments (
  assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  paper_id INT NOT NULL,
  reviewer_id INT NOT NULL,
  assignment_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (paper_id) REFERENCES research_papers(paper_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (reviewer_id) REFERENCES researchers(researcher_id)
)

CREATE TABLE reviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  assignment_id INT NOT NULL,
  reviewer_id INT NOT NULL,
  review_score DECIMAL(3,1),
  review_comment TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (assignment_id) REFERENCES peer_review_assignments(assignment_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (reviewer_id) REFERENCES researchers(researcher_id)
)
